mapper.sql: id, cas_no, smiles, SpMaxA_EAdm, MPC07, CATS2D_05_LL, LC50_96h, exp_value, pre_value, datatype
mapper.insert: insert into fish_chronic (id, cas_no, smiles, SpMaxA_EAdm, MPC07, CATS2D_05_LL, LC50_96h, exp_value, pre_value, datatype) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spmaxaEadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mpc07,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cats2d05Ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lc5096h,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into fish_chronic
id,
cas_no,
smiles,
SpMaxA_EAdm,
MPC07,
CATS2D_05_LL,
LC50_96h,
exp_value,
pre_value,
datatype,

#{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update fish_chronic
cas_no = #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SpMaxA_EAdm = #{spmaxaEadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
MPC07 = #{mpc07,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CATS2D_05_LL = #{cats2d05Ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LC50_96h = #{lc5096h,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datatype = #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fish_chronic
smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SpMaxA_EAdm = #{spmaxaEadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
MPC07 = #{mpc07,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CATS2D_05_LL = #{cats2d05Ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LC50_96h = #{lc5096h,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cas_no = #{casNo} and datatype = #{datatype}

update fish_chronic set cas_no = #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SpMaxA_EAdm = #{spmaxaEadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MPC07 = #{mpc07,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CATS2D_05_LL = #{cats2d05Ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LC50_96h = #{lc5096h,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datatype = #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sum(if(exp_value=1 and pre_value=1 ,1,0)) as TP, sum(if(exp_value=0 and pre_value=0 ,1,0)) as TN, sum(if(exp_value=1 and pre_value=0 ,1,0)) as FN, sum(if(exp_value=0 and pre_value=1 ,1,0)) as FP, sum(if(datatype=#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)) as nums from (select from fish_chronic where datatype=#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as newtable
